import { useState } from 'react' import './Header.scss' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' import basket from '../../assets/basket.svg' import menu from '../../assets/menu.svg' import SideBar from '../SideBar/SideBar' function Header() { const [isOpenSide, setIsOpenSide] = useState(false); const showSideBar = () => { setIsOpenSide(!isOpenSide) document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; } return (
) } export default Header
